attributes.action: ensure that the Post Office at Potten End, Herts is not closed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Post Office is situated in a small rural village and is currently being considered for closure, in line with many others. A closure of the post office could lead to the closure of the only remaining village shop,would create major difficulties for the village residents (business and elderly in particular), with the nearest alternative post office some 2.5 miles away.
